comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ouvrage_Boussois en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Siege_of_Maubeuge "The Siege of Maubeuge took place between August 24 and September 7, 1914 when the French garrison of the Maubeuge Fortress finally surrendered to the Germans at the start of World War I on the Western Front."
